name: Maya Pyramid
description:
This casual game is highly recommended to all fans of puzzle, card, board, and brain training games. A beautifully illustrated card puzzle game by the makers of Cleopatra's Pyramid.

KEY FEATURES OF THE GAME:
* Hours of entertaining brain training
* Maya Pyramid is a challenging variation of the "Pyramid" solitaire game
* More than 70 unique level designs in 28 stages in Adventure mode
* Build your very own Maya Pyramid out of 12 beautiful pyramid blocks
* Experience the Maya jungle at night - depending on the time you play
* Play the interactive tutorial to learn the basics of Maya Pyramid
* Beautiful Maya-themed artwork


ENTERTAINING BRAIN TRAINING
Go along on an expedition, combine the right cards, and solve all puzzles to create your very own Maya Pyramid. Overgrown by lianas, the gold of the Maya has been hidden in the jungle for centuries. Now it's up to you to find your way into the secret treasure chamber.

A TRICKY SOLITAIRE CARD GAME VARIATION
Maya Pyramid is a variation of the "Pyramid" solitaire game. This variation requires you to form card pyramids by marking groups of cards which add up to 11.

“Match cards up to add to 11, revealing other cards and then repeat. In actuality, it’s a nail-biting good time. The game is fast-paced and exciting and younger players won’t realize they’re building strong math skills in the process. It’s a wonderful example of the “easy to grasp, difficult to master” philosophy that makes for a good game." (Chris Morris, Journalist)

"This FreeCell related game requires skill and patience to win. I used to play classic card games on my Windows computer, Maya Pyramid is easy to learn, but fun to play and definitely addicting." (User)
